title: Recommendations for Philadelphia ballot questions
description: While much attention has been paid to the presidential race, far less heralded are local issues, including four ballot questions. Here's how The Daily Pennsylvanian Editorial Board recommends handling the questions.
author: The Daily Pennsylvanian Editorial Board

title: Why you should vote for Joe Biden
author: Francois Barrilleaux

title: Whether your “side” wins or loses, open dialogue must triumph
author: Justin Greenman

title: Don’t try to take the high road this election
author: Valerie Wang

title: Why STEM students should support Biden
author: Matthew Liu

title: Why a Woman Couldn’t Say 'Will You Shut Up, Man'
author: Isabella Glassman

title: Policy is more important than politics
author: Varun Saraswathula
